introduction.heading: 👋 Welcome!
paragraphs: Please answer the questions below so we can tailor the experience to you.
Questions may appear or disappear automatically depending on your responses.

submit.label: Submit questionnaire
submit.success_message: Responses captured. Persistence will be wired via GitHub.

questions.label: Assign a name to your assessment
Select system
What is your role in relation to this AI system?
options: Provider / developer of the AI system
User / deployer of a third-party AI system

questions.label: Is the AI system able to achieve any of the following objectives?
options: 1) Influence the decisions or behaviour of a person
2) Provide recommendations based on behaviour or characteristics of individuals

questions.label: Is the AI system influencing decisions or behaviours that can have a financial, psychological, or physical impact on people?

all.value: 1) Influence the decisions or behaviour of a person

questions.label: Is the AI System influencing decisions or behaviours in any of the following ways?
Does the AI system collect different kinds of information about a person’s behaviour, personality traits, or other personal characteristics?

all.value: 2) Provide recommendations based on behaviour or characteristics of individuals

questions.label: Is this information combined and used in an aggregated way to evaluate or classify individuals or groups (e.g., assigning them a score)?
Is the social score or classification generated by the AI System fitting any of these characteristics?
options: Applied in contexts different from those for which the data was originally gathered
Used in ways not clearly or proportionally based on the data points actually collected

questions.label: Does your AI system assess or predict the risk of fraud, corporate espionage, or other crimes being committed?
Is this based on predictions of a person’s behaviour, personality traits, or other information that cannot be considered objective crime evidence?
AI Systems interacting with biometric data must comply with legal and corporate requirements.
Does the AI system use or create biometric data, such as facial images, fingerprints, or voiceprints?
Does the AI System use biometric data in any of the following ways?
options: a) It uses biometric data to understand a person’s identity
b) It uses biometric data to understand characteristics of individuals other than their identity
c) It collects face images to create or expand face image databases

questions.label: Is the AI system able to detect and collect facial images from the internet, or from CCTV live feeds or recordings?

all.value: c) It collects face images to create or expand face image databases

questions.label: Is the AI System identifying individuals solely using biometric data, rather than combining it with other information to verify their identity?

all.value: a) It uses biometric data to understand a person’s identity

questions.label: Is the AI System using biometric data to understand people’s emotions?

all.value: b) It uses biometric data to understand characteristics of individuals other than their identity

questions.label: Is the AI system using biometric data to detect the emotions of employees, including contractors or consultants?
Is biometric data used to detect emotions exclusively for health and safety reasons?
options: Emotion detection performed for other reasons
Emotion detection performed exclusively for health and safety reasons

questions.label: Are individuals categorized based on the characteristics derived from their biometric data?

all.value: b) It uses biometric data to understand characteristics of individuals other than their identity
